handlers.code:
local slots = {}
slots.containers = {}

local debugIndex = 0
local debugFontSize = 2.5
local function debugPrint(msg)
    if screen then
        screen.addText(0, debugIndex * debugFontSize, debugFontSize, msg)
        debugIndex = debugIndex + 1
    end
    system.print(msg)
end

local startTime = system.getArkTime()
local function getElapsed()
    return string.format("%.1fs", system.getArkTime() - startTime)
end

-- Find containers in slots 7 and 8
for slot_name, slot in pairs(unit) do
    if slot_name == "slot7" or slot_name == "slot8" then
        if type(slot) == "table" and slot.getClass then
            local className = slot.getClass()
            if string.match(className, "Container") then
                slots.containers[slot_name] = slot
                debugPrint("Found " .. slot_name .. ": Container ID " .. slot.getLocalId())
            end
        end
    end
end

-- Create ordered list of containers to test
local containerList = {}
if slots.containers.slot7 then
    table.insert(containerList, {name = "slot7", container = slots.containers.slot7})
end
if slots.containers.slot8 then
    table.insert(containerList, {name = "slot8", container = slots.containers.slot8})
end

if #containerList == 0 then
    debugPrint("ERROR: No containers found in slot7 or slot8")
    unit.exit()
end

debugPrint("===================================")
debugPrint("Testing " .. #containerList .. " containers")
debugPrint("===================================")

_G.currentIndex = 0
_G.containerList = containerList
_G.debugPrint = debugPrint
_G.getElapsed = getElapsed

function _G.processNextContainer()
    _G.currentIndex = _G.currentIndex + 1
    
    if _G.currentIndex > #_G.containerList then
        debugPrint("===================================")
        debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] All containers tested!")
        debugPrint("===================================")
        unit.exit()
        return
    end
    
    local info = _G.containerList[_G.currentIndex]
    local container = info.container
    local id = container.getLocalId()
    
    debugPrint("")
    debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] --- Testing " .. info.name .. " (ID: " .. id .. ") ---")
    
    -- Call updateContent and check return value
    local updateResult = container.updateContent()
    
    if updateResult and updateResult > 0 then
        -- On cooldown
        debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] updateContent() returned: " .. string.format("%.2f", updateResult) .. "s (ON COOLDOWN)")
        debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] Waiting " .. (math.ceil(updateResult) + 1) .. "s...")
        unit.setTimer("getContent", math.ceil(updateResult) + 1)
    else
        -- Request accepted
        debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] updateContent() returned: " .. tostring(updateResult) .. " (ACCEPTED)")
        debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] Waiting 2s for server to update cache...")
        unit.setTimer("getContent", 2)
    end
end

function _G.getCurrentContent()
    local info = _G.containerList[_G.currentIndex]
    local container = info.container
    local id = container.getLocalId()
    
    debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] Calling getContent()...")
    local itemsList = container.getContent()
    debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] Items returned: " .. #itemsList)
    
    if #itemsList > 0 then
        for _, item in pairs(itemsList) do
            local itemData = system.getItem(item.id)
            debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "]   - " .. itemData.displayName .. " x" .. item.quantity)
        end
    else
        debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "]   (empty or no data)")
    end
    
    -- Move to next container
    _G.processNextContainer()
end

-- Start the test
debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] Starting serialized test...")
debugPrint("")
_G.processNextContainer()
